casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie FORREST, III. No. 270A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 15, 2005. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Willie Forrest, III. Kevin L. Anderson, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of April 2005 by Amici (ACLU and NCATL) for permission to participate in oral argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of April 2005."
